abstract: Sen John McCain, chairman of Senate Armed Services Committee, threatens to convene hearing if Army decides not to punish Sergeant Bowe Bergdahl for abandoning his military outpost in Afghanistan in 2009, saying Bergdahl is 'clearly a deserter' who put other American soldiers' lives in danger and may even be responsible for the deaths of some service members.
lead_paragraph: The senator, who is the chairman of the Armed Services Committee, threatened to convene a hearing if the Army decided not to punish Sergeant Bergdahl for abandoning his military outpost in Afghanistan in 2009.

headline.main: John McCain’s Comments on Bowe Bergdahl Bring Rebuke From Lawyer
headline.print_headline: Lawyer Objects to Comments From McCain on Bergdahl
